doc.field: Correspondence. Port of Authority arbitration materials. Bakers Union arbitration materials. Workshop on Labor Relations meeting notes. Clippings. Nurses Association materials. "Manual for an Economic Security Programs" (State Nurses Association guide). "Problems and Standards in Labor Arbitration: A Study of the New York State Experience," Manson dissertation (1955). NYS Board of Mediation "Table of Cases" and other materials.
